channel.title: Is my server blocking people?
channel.description:
I can log on fine and my players could all log on fine until I IP'd this one flooder. Here is the Run screen. Is it blocking flooders or the person I IP'd?
[code]Connection from 192.168.1.1:56472 [client-1-Runecrafter]: Loading Process Completed [Regular pl Connection from 217.23.15.194:52770 ClientHandler: Client null disconnected (217.23.15.194) Connection from 69.65.42.216:41339 ClientHandler: Client null disconnected (69.65.42.216) Game saved for player Runecrafter ClientHandler: Client Runecrafter disconnected (192.168.1.1) Connection from 217.23.15.194:36471 ClientHandler: Client null disconnected (217.23.15.194) Connection from 217.23.15.194:33544 ClientHandler: Client null disconnected (217.23.15.194) Connection from 217.23.15.194:54390 ClientHandler: Client null disconnected (217.23.15.194) Connection from 217.23.15.194:50282 ClientHandler: Client null disconnected (217.23.15.194) Connection from 217.23.15.194:53701 ClientHandler: Client null disconnected (217.23.15.194) [/code]

item.title: Is my server blocking people?
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

The nulls are disconnecting. As long as you have the IP banned and they run their bot, you will have this. I experienced the same problem with older servers - just wait until they give up and turn your server back on. The constant connection/disconnection of nulls can easily prevent players from logging on.

Read full topic

item.title: Is my server blocking people?
item.dc:creator: @superpersonxd superpersonxd
item.description:
@superpersonxd wrote:

[quote=“staticfish1, post:1, topic:338272”]I can log on fine and my players could all log on fine until I IP’d this one flooder. Here is the Run screen. Is it blocking flooders or the person I IP’d?

Connection from 192.168.1.1:56472 [client-1-Runecrafter]: Loading Process Completed [Regular pl Connection from 217.23.15.194:52770 ClientHandler: Client null disconnected (217.23.15.194) Connection from 69.65.42.216:41339 ClientHandler: Client null disconnected (69.65.42.216) Game saved for player Runecrafter ClientHandler: Client Runecrafter disconnected (192.168.1.1) Connection from 217.23.15.194:36471 ClientHandler: Client null disconnected (217.23.15.194) Connection from 217.23.15.194:33544 ClientHandler: Client null disconnected (217.23.15.194) Connection from 217.23.15.194:54390 ClientHandler: Client null disconnected (217.23.15.194) Connection from 217.23.15.194:50282 ClientHandler: Client null disconnected (217.23.15.194) Connection from 217.23.15.194:53701 ClientHandler: Client null disconnected (217.23.15.194) [/quote]

No your server is protecting it’s self you have the anti-nuller code. Someone is trying to flood your server be happy you had the code in there.

Read full topic
